node.doctext: Rarrrgh! Typos! SMASH TYPOS! *noises of: hammers, saws, heavy things falling down, and a gratuitously scalded cat running for safety*. This is the usergroup for [Typo Death Squad]. There's really no traffic here, but the communication channel is primed and ready for THE REVOLUTION! And pie and birthday parties and such.
node.title: typos
